title: What are the basic concepts of idealism? - Quora

response.answer_text: Garbage in, garbage out. The KJV is the standard for the English language. In the Word of God, it can be considered strife, contentious, strivings about the law, which are unfruitful. Charity is the supreme force in the universe. Knowledge puffeth up. Left hemisphere dominance is evil. Faith is contrary to the carnal man.
